item.title:
Ever wondered what university Vice Chancellors actually do?
The truth is they feed off the academic system in a similar way to commercial academic publishers, extracting maximum personal benefit while delivering very little of value.
How long before this game is up, I wonder. https://t.co/F7VZTlS5fi

item.title: We used this dataset to train a ‚Äúdigital twin‚Äù model of the mouse visual cortex developed by Wang et al. (https://t.co/6K8KcG9JsY) that accurately predicts neuronal responses to arbitrary video stimuli and offers a comprehensive characterization of neural tuning.

item.title: We separated neuronal tuning into a feature component (what neuron responds to) and a spatial component (where neuron receptive field is located). The feature component (top), but not the spatial component (bottom), predicted fine synaptic scale connectivity (üî¥). https://t.co/NFYoJanV3Z

item.title: We next investigated whether the feature component (FW) offers additional information on connectivity beyond signal correlation (SC). item.title: By leveraging the #MICrONS dataset and digital twin models, we expanded and refined our understanding of synapse organization principles in the neocortex. Our work offers a first look at the structure-function relationship that can be discovered using this unprecedented dataset.
